title: 250-msec cross track ion drift velocities - Rod Heelis (University of Texas, Dallas)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch_velY' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/de/de2/plasma_idm/vion250ms_cdaweb/1981/de2_vion250ms_idm_19810815_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 87.7778% of the 79 timesteps. Cadence = 16000 [ms] = PT16S.
info.contact: Rod Heelis @ University of Texas, Dallas

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: NSSDC standard-reference time value (ion velocity) Y direction.

parameters.name: ionVelocityY
parameters.description: Ion velocity in s/c y direction - vi_y - app. vertical (>0 upward)

parameters.name: dataQualityY
parameters.description: Data quality flag for vi_y (0-1: good; 2-3: averaging recom.; 4-5: unreliable
